quote.issuer_name: Shanghai INT Medical Instruments Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Shanghai INT Medical Instruments Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Shanghai INT Medical Instruments Co Ltd, formerly Shanghai Kindly Medical Instruments Co Ltd, is a China-based company principally engaged in the research, development, production and sales of intracardiac interventional devices. The Company operates its businesses through two segments. The Intracardiac Interventional Business segment is mainly engaged in the sales, manufacturing and research and development of intracardiac interventional medical devices and related molds, standard parts and masks. The Other segment is engaged in the research and development of other interventional medical devices, such as neurointerventional medical devices and heart valve implantable medical devices. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market and overseas markets.
